text: 12:16 Jenesis 25:29-34Egh ian tav poroghamiba uari bakɨa uari ko akuir arazim damuan markɨ. Egh tav Iso fomɨra amizɨ moghɨn, akɨrim ragh God gasan markɨ. An Aisakɨn otarir ivariam, egh bizir aghuir avɨriba iniam fɨrɨn, a dagher otevir vamɨra bagha pura uan bizir aghuiba bar da isa uan dozimɨn agharim gatɨ.
